ygData.subject: Happy April Fool's Day!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to lots of hard work and dumb luck, I have managed to crack the code in Gladiator so that I can implement all these character changes we suggested.

Thanks to lots of hard work and dumb luck, I have managed to crack the 
code in Gladiator so that I can implement all these character changes 
we suggested.  While I was at it, I also managed to learn how to add a 
new cheat code that allows me to add ten million of points to my team 
per second.

April Fools.
